name: Tabaluga
overview: Tabaluga is a Role-Playing game, developed by NEON Software GmbH and published by Infogrames, which was released in Europe in 1999. Zelda-like adventure in which the dragon Tabaluga goes out to protect his homeland, Greenland, from the evil snowman Arktos. Licensed title based on the popular German kids cartoon character (and musical) Tabaluga.
